javanews.object.save
Class SaveData

java.lang.Object
  javanews.object.save.SaveData

public class SaveData
extends java.lang.Object

This class is responsible for outputting data from a GenericTable to a CSV file.

Version:
1.000
Author:
Alex Harris (email: Alexander.J.Harris(at)btinternet.com)

Field Summary
private static java.lang.String className
          The unique name of the logger within the application
private  java.util.logging.Logger log
          The logger to be used for writing messages to the application log
private  java.lang.String owningPort
          The identifying name of the owning COM port
private  GenericTable source
          The table containing source data to be exported to the file
 
Constructor Summary
SaveData(GenericTable data, java.lang.String owner)
          Initialises the class and attaches an instance of GenericTable to it which will be later exported.
 
Method Summary
 boolean exportData()
          Prompts the user for a location and name for the CSV file and then exports the contents of the GenericTable object to it.

Method Detail

exportData

public boolean exportData()
Prompts the user for a location and name for the CSV file and then exports the contents of the GenericTable object to it.

Returns:
Whether the method executed without encountering any errors.
